547 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS  
  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
    Knowledge, Igbo, Yoruba, Literature in English, Music, 
French and Economics.  
  
UTME SUBJECT  
(i) ABU requires Using of English, Fine Arts and any two (2) 
other subjects.  
(ii) OAU requires Fine Arts and two (2) other subjects. The two 
(2) subjects to be chosen fr om options in UTME 
requirements.
